title: Under the Skin
writer: Walter Campbell, Jonathan Glazer, Michel Faber
actors: Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy McWilliams, Lynsey Taylor Mackay
plot: A mysterious young woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. However, events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.
awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA 23 wins & 113 nominations total
